NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG/SEASONAL-ROLES
Please do not reply to this email. This email was sent from an unattended mailbox and responses are not reviewed. Dear {!Contact.Name}
Your application has been received.
Thank you for submitting an application to work with The Challenge on the NCS programme 2015.
We aim to review applications within two weeks of receiving them.
If you do not hear back from us within this period, please contact us on seasonalroles@the-challenge.org quoting the email reference below in any correspondence.
Thank you for your interest in The Challenge and the NCS programme 2015.
Best Wishes
The Challenge
seasonalroles@the-challenge.org
Email Reference: CR 2.3.2
